steps.criteria: [NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!
[NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.

steps.instruction:
Buy Coal &b%1&r
Buy Iron Ingot &b%2&r
Buy Gold Ingot &b%3&r
&fBuy Promising Pickaxe&r &b%4&r
Buy Black Diamond &b%5&r

Craft Golden Axe &b%1&r
&fCraft Golden Shovel &b%2&r
&fCraft Shears &b%3&r

steps.criteria: Your pet is now holding All Skills Exp Boost.
You have reached the daily cap of 500,000 Enchanting EXP. Keep in mind EXP from experiments bypasses this cap!
COLLECTION LEVEL UP Oak Wood II➜III

Craft Pig Minion I &b%2

steps.criteria: You picked up a minion! You currently have

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Promising Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.criteria: COLLECTION LEVEL UP Lapis Lazuli III➜IV

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.criteria: [NPC] Lone Adventurer: Try killing 5 of them!

steps.instruction:
Obtain Ender Helmet &b%1&r
Obtain Ender Chestplate &b%2&r
Obtain Ender Leggings &b%3&r

steps.criteria: [NPC] Sam: Head over to the desk, there you can browse SkyMart to order some fuel.
